messages.subject: Re: Kids bedrooms - was Children and television
messages.msgSnippet: Then according to her all of my friends (bar myself and one other with onlys - and then they re in our beds more often than not) are abusers! I don t know
messages.messageBody:
Then according to her all of my friends (bar myself
and one other with onlys - and then they're in our
beds more often than not) are abusers! I don't know
anyone who has separate rooms for their kids - oh, I
just thought of one (she has a huge house though)! :)

Meghan

>I had a friend who thought it was child abuse to
>make my kids
>share
>a room. In her words, "If you can't afford a room
>for each kid, then
>you
>can't afford the kids!" Sheesh.
>Amy
>Amy Kagey in NW Ohio
